Source.Name: step
Source.Description: Step is an interactive physical simulator. It allows you to explore the physical world through simulations.

Source.Description: The syntax is very much inspired from the "dialog" command (which shows text mode dialogs).

Source.Name: blinken
Source.Description: Blinken is based on an electronic game released in 1978, which challenges players to remember sequences of increasing length. On the face of the device, there are 4 different color buttons, each one with their own distinctive sound.

Source.Name: kmahjongg
Source.Description: KMahjongg is a fun board game created after the famous oriental game of Mahjong. Unlike the original however, KMahjongg is a tile matching game for one or two players, a variation usually known as Mahjong Solitaire.

Source.Description: KAlarm is a personal alarm message, audio, command and email scheduler

Source.Description: Picmi is a single player logic-based puzzle game. The goal is to color cells according to numbers given at the side of the board in order to uncover a hidden pattern or picture.

Source.Name: kolourpaint

Source.Description: KolourPaint is a simple painting program to quickly create raster images. It is useful as a touch-up tool and simple image editing tasks.

Source.Name: klines
Source.Description: Kolor Lines is a simple but highly addictive, one player game for KDE. Kolor Lines has been inspired by well known game of Color Lines. The goal of Kolor Lines is quite plain. The player has to move the colored balls around the game board, gathering them into the lines of the same color by five.

Source.Name: kblackbox
Source.Description: KBlackBox is a game of hide and seek played on a grid of boxes. The computer has hidden several balls within this box. By shooting beams into the box and observing where they emerge it is possible to deduce the positions of the hidden balls.

Source.Name: killbots
Source.Description: Killbots is a simple game of evading killer robots. Who created the robots and why they have been programmed to destroy, no one knows. All that is known is that the robots are numerous and their sole objective is to destroy you.

Source.Name: parley
Source.Summary: Parley is a program to help you memorize things.
Source.Description: Parley is a program to help you memorize things. Parley supports many language specific features but can be used for other learning tasks just as well. It uses the spaced repetition learning method, also known as flash cards. Creating new vocabulary collections with Parley is easy, but of course it is even better if you can use some of our premade files. Have a look at the KDE-Files.org page or use the "Download New Collections" feature directly in Parley.

Source.Name: kbounce
Source.Description: KBounce is a single player arcade game with the elements of puzzle. It is played on a field, surrounded by walls, with two or more balls that move about in the field bouncing off of walls. The player can build new walls, decreasing the size of the active field. The goal of the game is to fill at least 75% of the field and advance to the next level.

Source.Name: kwave
Source.Description: With Kwave you can record, play back, import and edit many sorts of audio files including multi channel files.Kwave includes some plugins to transform audio files in several ways and presents a graphical view with a complete zoom- and scroll capability.

Source.Name: kanagram
Source.Description: Kanagram is a game based on anagrams of words: the puzzle is solved when the letters of the scrambled word are put back in the correct order. There is no limit on either time taken, or the amount of attempts to solve the word.

Source.Name: knetwalk
Source.Description: KNetWalk is a single player logic game. The object of the game is to start the LAN, connecting all the terminals to the server, in as few turns as possible.

Source.Name: kwordquiz
Source.Summary: Kwordquiz is a Flash Card Trainer
Source.Description: KWordQuiz is a tool that gives you a powerful way to master new vocabularies. It may be a language or any other kind of terminology..

Source.Name: kamera
Source.Description: Kamera is a plugin for KDE to use webcam.

Source.Name: kgeography
Source.Summary: KGeography is a geography learning tool
Source.Description: KGeography is a geography learning tool, which allows you to learn about the political divisions of some countries (divisions, capitals of those divisions and their associated flags if there are some).

Source.Description: Akregator helps you to keep informed about new stories on websites like KDE Dot News and Planet KDE blogs. The technology used is RSS and many sites support it.

Source.Name: kapman
Source.Description: Kapman is a clone of the well known game Pac-Man. You must go through the levels escaping ghosts in a maze. You lose a life when a ghost eats you, but you can eat the ghosts for a few seconds when eating an energizer.

Source.Name: rocs

Rocs has a scripting module, done in Qt Script, that interacts with the drawn graph and every change in the graph with the script is reflected on the drawn one..

Source.Name: qt5-phonon-backend-gstreamer
Source.Description: Phonon is the Qt multimedia API, which provides a task-oriented abstraction layer for capturing, mixing, processing, and playing audio and video content. phonon-backend-gstreamer contains the GStreamer backend for Phonon.

Source.Name: qt5-phonon
Source.Summary: Cross platform multimedia API for KDE4 using QT5
Source.Description: Phonon was created as a solution to several problems with multimedia commonly faced by Unix desktops, especially KDE 3's outdated multimedia framework aRts. Phonon itself is not a multimedia framework, but interfaces with existing frameworks such as GStreamer or Xine via backends.

Source.Name: kstars
Source.Description: KStars is a Desktop Planetarium for KDE. It provides an accurate graphical simulation of the night sky, from any location on Earth, at any date and time. Component.Name: desktop
Component.Summary: Component that includes desktop software and desktop environments
Masaüstü yazılımları ve masaüstü ortamlarını içeren bileşen
Bu masa üstü kompüter üçün proqram olan komponentdir.
Компонент, который включает в себя программное обеспечение рабочего стола и среды рабочего стола
Composante qui comprend les logiciels et les environnements de bureau
Component.Description: Desktop component includes basic desktop and gui toolkits (GimpToolKit, QT) and desktop environments and applications built with these tool kits. In that component, all desktop environments, especially KDE gnome Xfce LXDE and lxqt are available.

Masaüstü bileşeni temel masaüstü ve guı araç kitleri (Gımptoolkit, QT) ve masaüstü ortamları ve bu araç kitleri ile inşa uygulamaları içerir. Bu bileşende, tüm masaüstü ortamları, özellikle KDE gnome XFCE LXDE ve lxqt mevcuttur.

Komponent Desktop daxildir əsas dəstləri və alətləri üçün masa üstü kompüter və qrafik istifadəçi interfeysi (GimpToolKit, QT) və ətraf mühitin masa üstü və proqramlar vasitəsilə yaradılmış bu alətlər dəsti. Bu komponent bütün masa üstü mühitləri, xüsusilə gnome Xfce LXDE və lxqt KDE mövcuddur.

Компонент Desktop включает в себя основные наборы инструментов для настольных компьютеров и графического интерфейса пользователя (GimpToolKit, QT) и среды рабочего стола и приложения, созданные с помощью этих наборов инструментов. В этом компоненте доступны все среды рабочего стола, особенно KDE gnome Xfce LXDE и lxqt.

Die Desktop-Komponente umfasst die grundlegende desktop - und grafische Benutzeroberfläche (GimpToolKit, QT) sowie die mit diesen toolkits erstellten desktop-Umgebungen und-Anwendungen. Alle desktop-Umgebungen sind in dieser Komponente verfügbar, insbesondere KDE gnome Xfce LXDE und lxqt.

La composante de bureau comprend le bureau de base et l'interface graphique utilisateur (GimpToolKit, QT) toolkits et les environnements de bureau et les applications créées avec ces toolkits. Tous les environnements de bureau sont disponibles dans cette composante, en particulier KDE gnome Xfce LXDE et lxqt.

Component.Name: desktop.kde
Component.Summary: This is the root component that contains the kde desktop environment.
kde masaüstü ortamını içeren kök bileşendir.
kde masa üstü mühitini ehtiva edən bir kök komponentdir
kde-это корневой компонент, содержащий среду рабочего стола
desktop.kde ist die root-Komponente, die kde desktop-Umgebung enthält
desktop.kde est le composant racine qui contient l'environnement de kde bureau
Component.Description: The KDE desktop environment is the largest desktop environment ever built for operating systems like linux and unix. in itself includes network tools, video editor, design applications, even training applications.

KDE masaüstü ortamı linux ve unix benzeri işletim sistemleri için yapılmış en büyük masaüstü ortamıdır. kendi içerisinde network araçları, video editörü, dizayn uygulamaları hatta eğitim uygulamaları içerir.

KDE masa üstü mühiti linux və unix-like əməliyyat sistemləri üçün yaradılmış ən böyük masa üstü mühitidir. şəbəkə alətləri, video redaktoru, hazırlanmış proqramlar və ya hətta təhsil proqramları daxildir.

Среда рабочего стола KDE-самая большая среда рабочего стола, созданная для операционных систем linux и unix like. он включает в себя сетевые инструменты, видеоредактор, разработанные приложения или даже образовательные приложения.

Die KDE-desktop-Umgebung ist die größte desktop-Umgebung, die je für Betriebssysteme wie linux und unix gebaut wurde. an sich umfasst Netzwerk-tools, video-editor, design-Anwendungen, sogar trainingsanwendungen.

L'environnement de bureau KDE est le plus grand environnement de bureau jamais construit pour les systèmes d'exploitation comme linux et unix. en lui-même inclut des outils de réseau, un éditeur vidéo, des applications de conception, même des applications de formation.

Component.Name: desktop.kde.accessibility
Component.Summary: Erişilebilirlik üçün istifadə olunan tətbiqləri ehtiva edir
Component.Description: kde brings with it some accessibility programs. That programs are located under the desktop.kde.accesibility component.
kde beraberinde bazı erişilebilirlik programlarını getirir. bu program desktop.kde.accesibility bileşeni altında yer almaktadır.
KDE bəzi Erişilebilirlik proqramları gətirir. Bu proqramlar desktop.kde.accesibility komponentinin altındadır.
kde приносит с собой некоторые специальные программы. Что программы расположены под рабочим desktop.kde.accesibility доступности
kde bringt einige accessibility-Programme. dieses Programm ist desktop.kde.accesibility befindet sich unter der accesibility-Komponente.
kde apporte avec elle quelques programmes d'accessibilité. Que les programmes sont situés sous le desktop.kde.accesibility composante.

Component.Name: desktop.kde.addon
Component.Summary: Component that includes extra programs (addons) desktop software and desktop environments
Bu kde üçün ek paketler olan komponentdir.
Component.Description: That is the component that contains plug-in packages for the kde panel and some other kde applications.
kde panel ve diğer bazı uygulamalar için eklenti paketlerini içeren bileşendir.
kde panel üçün və bəzi digər tətbiqlər üçün plugin paketlərini ehtiva edən bir komponentdir.
Это компонент, который содержит пакеты плагинов для панели kde и некоторых других приложений kde.
Das ist die Komponente, die plug-in-Pakete für das kde-panel und einige andere kde-Anwendungen enthält.
C'est le composant qui contient les paquets plug-in pour le panneau kde et d'autres applications kde.

Component.Name: desktop.kde.admin
Component.Summary: That component includes kde administration tools.
kde yönetici araçlarını içeren paket bileşeni.
Bu masa üstü kompüter üçün proqram olan komponentdir.
этот компонент включает в себя средства администрирования kde.
cette composante comprend des outils d'administration kde.
Component.Description: That component includes kde administration tools.
kde yönetici araçlarını içeren paket bileşeni.
Bu masa üstü kompüter üçün proqram olan komponentdir.
этот компонент включает в себя средства администрирования kde.
cette composante comprend des outils d'administration kde.
